inputs.task: Review and improve homepage copy for LaunchBase
inputs.description: AI-powered website operations system that handles website updates, social media, and business intelligence for small businesses. Core value: responsibility transfer (hand off operations, keep visibility). Not a website builder - a complete operations handoff with observability, reversibility, and safety gating.

currentCopy.hero: Stop carrying the system in your head. Hand it off. Keep visibility.
currentCopy.problem: No one owns the system. You're the fallback for everything.
currentCopy.solution: LaunchBase becomes the owner. You stay informed, not involved.
currentCopy.trust: Safe by default. Fully logged. Reversible.

inputs.audience: Small business owners (fitness studios, coffee shops, consulting firms, e-commerce) who are tired of being the bottleneck for their website and marketing operations
inputs.tone: Direct, honest, reassuring. B2B professional. Emphasize responsibility transfer and observability.
inputs.constraints: No hype language. No unverifiable claims. Focus on concrete benefits: mental load reduction, visibility, reversibility, safety gating.

proposedChanges.value: Stop carrying the burden of operations. Hand it off.
proposedChanges.rationale: The word 'burden' adds emotional weight and clarity to the operations aspect, reinforcing the message of responsibility transfer.

proposedChanges.value: LaunchBase takes ownership of your website operations while you maintain visibility.
proposedChanges.rationale: This rephrasing clarifies the role of LaunchBase and emphasizes the balance between ownership and visibility.

proposedChanges.value: No clear ownership of your operations can lead to chaos.
proposedChanges.rationale: This change highlights the negative impact of the current situation, making the problem more relatable and urgent.

proposedChanges.value: With LaunchBase, you transfer ownership of operations and focus on your business.
proposedChanges.rationale: This wording emphasizes the benefit of focusing on the core business while LaunchBase handles operations, making the solution more appealing.

issues.description: Claims 'AI-powered website operations system' without proof in input
issues.rationale: Unverified claim - introduces AI capability not present in input

issues.description: Phrase 'fully logged' implies monitoring capabilities not explicitly stated
issues.rationale: Unverified claim - suggests a feature not confirmed in input

suggestedFixes.fix: Website operations system that handles updates, social media, and business intelligence for small businesses.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Removes unverifiable AI claim, focuses on core functionality

suggestedFixes.fix: Safe by default. Operations can be reverted.
suggestedFixes.rationale: Clarifies safety without implying unverified logging feature
